sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import Mcniel from '../images/mcniel.jpeg' import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Contact() { //setting our initial state, declaring variables const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", message: "" }); const [err, setError] = useState(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setInputs((prev) => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })); }; const submitForm = async () => { await axios.post("/contact/submitForm", inputs, { }) .then((response) => console.log(response)); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await submitForm(inputs) navigate("/contact"); } catch (err) { setError(err.response.data); console.log(err); } }; return (

Let’s talk

We would love to hear from you

Justin McNeil — Senior Lead

(257) 563-7401

JustinMcneil@mentally.org

Follow us

); } export default Contact;
